oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How to establish a perennial legume-grass sward?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nykänen, Arja
Nykänen-Kurki, Päivi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In 2002, a field experiment with split-plot design was established in Juva in order to compare the use of nurse crop to establish perennial legume grass sward in organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nykänen, Arja and Nykänen-Kurki, Päivi (2003) How to establish a perennial legume-grass sward? Paper at: Nordic agriculture in global perspective: NJF's 22nd congress, Turku, July 1-4, 2003.
